name: Into the Void (itch) (André Lima e Silva)
name_original: Into the Void (itch) (André Lima e Silva)
description:
Into the Void is a personal project to study, test and practice some of the Unity 2D features. If you have any questions about how some features are implemented in the game you can contact or follow me to see further updates.

CONTROLS
Run - Left and Right Arrow
Jump - X
Shot - Z
